content: The Gold Star pin is a reminder of freedom’s ultimate cost. On#GoldStarMothersDayand#GoldStarFamilysDay, we honor those who have lost loved ones in the defense of freedom and our nation. We recognize their courage and strength, and we will never forget their sacrifices.YESS INDEED  CONGRATULATIONS  EVERYONE OF THEM AND THANKS FOR THEIRS SERVICESMarina R Mendez I'm assumes command of the 184th Sustainment Command fromBrig. Gen. David O. Smith during a change of command ceremony at CampShelby Joint Forces Training Center, October 15, 2017. i was enlisted in theMississippi Army National Guard in May 1985, gaining 32 years of service. Myassignments have been various command and staff positions that includedmobilization and deployments, as well as service during periods of state activeduty for disaster response, Kindly inbox me on my official page okay thank you

content: The @ArmyERDC is working to improve the strength and durability of conventional concrete and asphalt-type materials by modifying them with advanced 2D materials, such as graphene, which are known to have superior mechanical, chemical, thermal and electrical properties. Researchers are also leveraging advanced composites to strengthen layered materials such as modular panels to make them more blast resistant.#resilience#sustainability
author: 美国国防部

content: Marking the way.United States Air ForceStaff Sgt. Nathan Merrit marks off a designated area with chalk during the annual Improvised Explosive Device Rodeo exercise at Spangdahlem Air Base, Germany.The multilateral exercise involved explosive ordnance disposal members from six nations focused on locating and disarming improvised explosive devices.Very cool!
author: 美国国防部

content: That’s a wrap!The 1 SOW had the pleasure of hosting the Joint Civilian Organization Conference. We immersed the JCOC in our daily operations to demonstrate how Air Commandos get it done any time, any place. Under AFSOC, the 1 SOW stands ready to take on challenges by training in and out of theater with our Army counterparts.#JCOC#AimHigh#AnyTimeAnyPlace#AFSOC#1SOW#JCOC#JointPartnership
